name: Eight Channel Module
summary: Learn about .8CM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The 8CM format is an improvement on the .MOD and .6CM formats, which support up to four and six channels, respectively. The eight channels in an 8CM file enable creators to layer multiple instruments, sound effects, or voices independently, giving them more control over the mix.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
